question: star wars the clone wars season 3 episode 1
api_result: "Star Wars: The Clone Wars" Season 3 Episode 1 is titled "Clone Cadets." It originally aired on September 17, 2010. The episode focuses on a group of clone cadets undergoing training on the planet Kamino. These cadets must overcome their personal differences and work together to pass their final test in order to become active-duty soldiers for the Grand Army of the Republic. The episode highlights themes of teamwork, leadership, and perseverance.
